channel.title: Falling In Reverse
channel.description:
I don't know how many of you guys listen to Falling In Reverse or pay attention to them. But their new album is out in June. They release a single called "Alone" and they changed their sound. Here's what they sounded in their first album: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rgWr2nln83s
And here's what they sound like now: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zcbOfVKSMkA
Also, their lead singer, Ronnie Radke, supposedly left. More information about that at: http://mindequalsblown.net/2013/05/18/ronnie-radke-supposedly-walks-out-on-falling-in-reverse/comment-page-1/

item.title: Falling In Reverse
item.dc:creator: @Crooks Crooks
item.description:
@Crooks wrote:

I have been a fan since I heard the first song of ETF (Escape the fate). Ronnie has made some bad moves over and over, but somehow i still like him… His new music style is somewhat good, but not even near the first album of FIR which was beast.

Like 2 weeks ago I was comparing FIR and ETF newest songs, and I must say that ETF has taken the lead! Incredibly good fucking songs. I don’t mean to take over this thread with ETF, but I have to link a song that moved me alot and it’s the best song i heard from them since Ronnie left.

[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1a3_S-2dA_I[/youtube]

Anyway, I also have to say something about Ronnie, imagine what he’s dealing with everyday, competing with his former friends from ETF and the whole prison part, max green etc etc… Ofc his mode breaks into pieces when his fans try to put him down too!

Read full topic

item.title: Falling In Reverse
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:15, topic:519744”]Wasn’t Ronnie the only reason FIN was any good? Wouldn’t they just be another shitty band without him?

Never realized ronnie was such a dick, I was always impartial to the whole ronnie vs craig thing however seeing that vid above just shows he’s a dick lol. love ronnie, I’ve never been one to hate on musicians but seriously love him.[/quote]
Their guitarist, Jacky Vincent, is really good. I’m sure he would have gotten somewhere if he hadn’t met Ronnie.

Read full topic

item.title: Falling In Reverse
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I think people are not reading what the article states - this has not been confirmed hence the title. And as for the song, I don’t like his new idea of music, he should remain in rock, alternate, emo etc., not this rap crap; ridiculous (the song ‘Alone’ at least).

item.title: Falling In Reverse
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:3, topic:519744”]I’ve been following this, well not really but i’ve been seeing a lot of it on facebook. The new song sucks completely, the drastic change in sound makes me want to rip my eyes out. I downloaded the song thinking it would be great without listening to it, i was wrong. Also, apart from him apparently leaving, one of the band members is supposedly about to be deported. They’re currently on a working visa, and as they’ve been removed from the band, looks like no more work.

This whole thing just seems silly though, this song, him leaving, so much drama.[/quote]
Who is ‘supposedly’ going to be deported?

Read full topic

item.title: Falling In Reverse
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

I’ve been following this, well not really but i’ve been seeing a lot of it on facebook. The new song sucks completely, the drastic change in sound makes me want to rip my eyes out. I downloaded the song thinking it would be great without listening to it, i was wrong. Also, apart from him apparently leaving, one of the band members is supposedly about to be deported. They’re currently on a working visa, and as they’ve been removed from the band, looks like no more work.

This whole thing just seems silly though, this song, him leaving, so much drama.

Read full topic
